external_references.description: John, E. and Carvey, H. (2019, May 30). Unraveling the Spiderweb: Timelining ATT&CK Artifacts Used by GRIM SPIDER. Retrieved May 12, 2020.

objects.description: [Wizard Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0102) has used spearphishing attachments to deliver Microsoft documents containing macros to download either [Emotet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0367), Bokbot, or [TrickBot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0266).(Citation: CrowdStrike Grim Spider May 2019)
